## Hypothesis Testing

guessing cards: red/black, red/red, black/black, black/black, red/red, black/black, black/black, black/black, black/black

9 right, 1 wrong

```{r}
estimator <- function(N, n, R, seed) {
  set.seed(seed)
  population <- 1:N 
  estimator_1_results <- c()
  estimator_2_results <- c()
  for (i in 1:R) {
    samp <- sample(population, size = n)
    estimator_1 <- max(samp)
    estimator_1_results <- c(estimator_1_results, estimator_1)
    estimator_2 <- max(samp) + min(samp)
    estimator_2_results <- c(estimator_2_results, estimator_2)
  }
 data.frame(est1 = estimator_1_results, est2 = estimator_2_results)
}

```
           
```{r}
estimator1 <- c()
estimator2 <- c()
estimator
```
